XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="TopicAnalytics" displayName="TopicAnalytics" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="Forum.Topic" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0" disableListingGroups="false"> <dimension name="Tech" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Name" allDisplayName="Name" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Technology" disabled="false" sourceExpression="%cube.TopicNameToTechnology(%source.Name)" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Author" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Author" allDisplayName="Author" type="data" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Author" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Author" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level name="ExtId" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.ExtId" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property name="Name" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.Name" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </property> <property name="Longitude" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.Longitude" hidden="false" isName="false" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"> </property> <property name="Latitude" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.Latitude" hidden="false" isName="false" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"> </property> <property name="Location" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AuthorId.Location" hidden="false" isName="false" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"> </property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Updated" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Updated" allDisplayName="Updated" sourceProperty="Updated" type="time" calendar="gregorian" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Year" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Month" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Week" displayName="Неделя" disabled="false" timeFunction="WeekYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </level> <level name="Day" displayName="День" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Topic" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Name1" allDisplayName="Name1" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Topic" displayName="Тема" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Name" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Posted" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Posted" allDisplayName="Posted" sourceProperty="Posted" type="time" calendar="gregorian" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Year" displayName="Год" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </level> <level name="Month" displayName="Месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </level> <level name="Week" disabled="false" timeFunction="WeekYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </level> <level name="Day" displayName="День" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level name="MonthNum" displayName="Месяц" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </level> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure name="Answers" displayName="Ответы" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Answers" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"> </measure> <measure name="Views" displayName="Просмотры" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Views" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"> </measure> <calculatedMember name="AVGAnswers" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[Measures].[Answers]/[Measures].[%Count]" hidden="false"> </calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="AVGViews" disabled="false" dimension="Measures" valueExpression="[Measures].[Views]/[Measures].[%Count]" hidden="false"> </calculatedMember> <listing name="Listing" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="Author,Name,Link,Posted"> </listing> <listing name="New_listing1" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="Name,Posted,Views,AuthorId->Name,AuthorId->Location,AuthorId->Latitude,AuthorId->Longitude"> <additionalDescription>undefined</additionalDescription> </listing> </cube>

Method.name: GetName
Method.Implementation: s author=##class(Forum.Post).%OpenId(id) if '$IsObject(author) q "" q author.Author
